description: File containing an MPEG-2 program stream consisting of 4:2:2 Profile MPEG-2 encoded video multiplexed with MPEG-1 and MPEG-2 Layer II encoded audio.  The program stream may also be delivered via a serial interface.
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension"></field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
name: MPEG-2 File with 422 Video and Layer II Audio Encoding
